captions.text:
"Thought"! Daniel, Andy
and Edu, please stand up.
How does the "Thought Game" work?

They will start a scene,
and when the bell is rung

we will hear one of the
characters' secret thoughts.

For that I'd like to know
your job, your profession.

- Bank clerk.
- Bank clerk! Perfect.

So 'bank clerk' is the profession
that kicks off the "Thought Game", now!
Next!

- Make this deposit.
- Okay...

- Pay these bills...
- All right...

This machine never works,
I have to type the damn code.
Lady, how long will it take?

- You brought 20 bills...
- They're from the company!
Clerk!

It's 3:50,
I'm going away in a while!

I'm going away in a while!
I'm going home in a while!
Again...

Camargo e Pereira...
Do you work at Camargo e Pereira?
No, I'm self-employed!

- But you provide services for Camargo e Pereira.
- I provide services for a lot of people.
Delivery man's thought!

I'm going to get the marginal avenue
all jammed, hurry up with this shit!
Hurry up with this shit, man!

I used to work at Camargo e Pereira,
that's where I met my husband!
My husband, Luis, he still works there!
Delivery man!
Screw this Luis, hurry up, lady!

Hurry up, this shit is
starting to get me nervous...

I'm gonna call him!
What's your name?

Everybody freeze!
Get down, lady!

I'm not kidding, I have a gun, man!
Everybody down!
Robber!

Guys, I've never used a gun before!
What should I do with it?

I don't know if it's loaded!
It's a fake gun, it shoots water!

Fuck yeah!
Nobody moves an inch, lady!
Nobody moves an inch, dude!

- Where's the fuckin' money?
- It's in the safe...
So open the fuckin' safe!
Clerk!
I was going away...

- C'mon, dammit!
- Right... There's three combinations...

I need to call the manager
to get the third one!
Delivery man!

Hurry up with this robbery,
man, I'll get Rebouças avenue...

You wanna be a hero, man?
You wanna be a hero?

Get down, I'm not kidding!
I'm not kidding...

- Yo, ain't you Wanderson?
- Shit, man! Wassup?

- Shit, man...
- How ya doin'?

Hang on, lady! Now you
wanna do shit faster, right?
Robber!

Wow, I feel so much secure
now that I met a homie!

If I hadn't met him, I don't
know if I could rob this place!

And I've robbed like,
a lot of candy stores!

But this is the first time
I try something bigger!

If I go to jail,
I'll be respected at least!

And that's what we
want in life, respect!

If not, what should we do? If life
ain't about respect, it's about what?

Money? I don't think so!
I'd rather be arrested knowing

that I tried to rob a
bank with a water gun!

It's been a long time, man,
since the days in the hood...

Yo, just 'cause we're talking
doesn't mean you can stop working!
Here! Here!

Make my homie's payments first,
then you give me the cash!
Clerk!
There go my pants...
Now I'll take the subway...

Put it in this trash bag!
Hurry!
It wasn't me, I swear!
Oh shit, oh shit!
Are you carrying any metal objects?

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
